metadata.description:
A prequel to Christophe Bec's best-selling, mind-bending science-fiction BD series Promethee – Promethee 13:13 by Andy Diggle and Shawn Martinbrough with covers by Jock. Exclusively available from comiXology Originals.

Headed by veteran editor Will Dennis, Promethee 13:13  explores what happened before the multi-volume bandes dessinées Promethee.

Part of the comiXology Originals line of exclusive digital content only available on comiXology and Kindle. This series will be available as part of comiXology Unlimited, Kindle Unlimited and Prime Reading.
metadata.name: Promethee 13:13 (comiXology Originals)
